text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.title: Faster Minecarts
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.a: Automatic Minecart Slowdown Before Curved Rail
Enable automatic slowdown before curved rail to prevent derailing.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Manual Minecart Slowdown On Soul Sand
Enable manual slowdown on soul sand blocks.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.f: Enable automatic slowdown for furnace minecarts on hoppers.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Change the maximum speed (in meters per second).
Vanilla, value is 8, default value is 24.
